problem_text:
14.33. Does there exist a finitely presented pro-p-group (p being a prime) which contains an isomorphic copy of every countably based pro-p-group?
R. I. Grigorchuk
answer: Yes, there does: the Nottingham group over Fp for p > 2, which was shown to be finitely presented in (M. V. Ershov, J. London Math. Soc., 71 (2005), 362–378). (M. Ershov, Letter of 19.10.2009.)
